hints.content:
To find how long $\purpleD{\text{Bo Peep's lasso}}$ is, we need to add $\blueE{\text{Woody's lasso}}$ with the $\maroonD{\text{extra length}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/86ddbe6ee2e6798deb1776194e57670075ede1c6)

$\blueE{11}\text{ feet}  + \maroonD{23}\text{ feet} =\purpleD{\square}\text{ feet}$

Let's add to find the total.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b696c1a88ef65beb3ee63a6ba61c68319c7dbec7)


$\blueE{11}\text{ feet}  + \maroonD{23}\text{ feet} =\purpleD{34}\text{ feet}$
Bo Peep's lasso is $\purpleD{34}\text{ ft}$ long.

question.content:
Woody has a lasso that is $11\text{ ft}$ long. Bo Peep has a lasso that is $23\text{ ft}$ longer than Woody's.  

**How long is Bo Peep's lasso?**  

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] $\text{ft}$
